name: Local Content Plan (Petroleum/Mining)
description: Compliance template for Petroleum/Mining sectors in Ghana to prove local hiring and procurement for commission licensing.

clauses.clause_text: The Company commits that at least {{ghanaian_staff_percent}}% of its total workforce will be Ghanaian citizens. Specifically, specialized training will be provided for {{training_areas}} to ensure knowledge transfer.

Preference shall be given to Ghanaian service providers for the following categories: {{local_service_categories_catering_logistics_security}}. The Company aims for a local spend of {{local_spend_target}} (GHS) per annum.
In accordance with GIPC and Commission requirements, the Company will transfer technical expertise in {{tech_expertise_area}} to Ghanaian partners over a period of {{transfer_years}} years.
The Company shall submit quarterly local content performance reports to the {{regulatory_body_petroleum_commission_minerals_commission}}.
